column1: leona margarete sebok | of leona sebok. mrs. leona margarete sebok
column3: of west jefferson passed away june 5
column4: 2015 at forest ridge living assisted living. a memorial service will be held on saturday
column6: 2015 at 11:00am at boone family funeral home chapel. the family will receive friends from 10:30-11:00am prior to the memorial service. mr. sebok is survived by her daughter
